column4: Hey all.  I am trying out Linux for the first time...I ran the Ubuntu CD but when it pulls up the desktop, it shows a small box with a lot of lines (graphic error type) and locks up...any suggestions?
that just means its formatting your computer. once partitions are all erased and swap is added it will come back
ive never bothered with the livecd i usually just burn the alternate installcd. its text based so less problems
yeah you can experiment it just depends on how much time you want to put into  loading the cd just to install
